findings.title: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract’s safety and security
findings.description: The active owner has excessive privileges, allowing them to change transaction tax, allowances, etc., which poses a significant risk to the smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Liquidity pair contract’s security is not checked due to out of scope
findings.description: The liquidity pair contract's security was not evaluated as it fell outside the audit's scope.

findings.title: Project Website Not Checked Due to Out of Scope
findings.description: The project website was not reviewed due to being out of scope, including checks for SSL and lighthouse report.

findings.title: Project Team and Social Channels Not Checked
findings.description: The project team and social channels were not reviewed or checked due to being out of scope.
